availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Benton Nevitt (Larue County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Hodgenville, Kentucky, attorney. Larue County, Kentucky, native. Son of James A. Nevitt and Nancy A. Nevitt. Married to Mary Jane Bowling Nevitt in Nelson County, Kentucky, on December 14, 1858. Father of M. G. Nevitt. Attorney in Hodgenville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Larue County, Hamiltons District, p. 427B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Larue County, Hodgenville, p. 144.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nelson County Marriages, Film #000500448.
